CustomField.description: Tracks number of days with Vendor based on working days
CustomField.formula: (Date_PS_Removed_from_Vendor__c - Date_PS_Updated_to_Vendor__c ) - ( FLOOR ( ( ( (Date_PS_Removed_from_Vendor__c) - Date_PS_Updated_to_Vendor__c ) / 7 ) ) * 2 ) + CASE(MOD ( Date_PS_Updated_to_Vendor__c - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7), 0,CASE( MOD ((Date_PS_Removed_from_Vendor__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7),0,1,2 ), 1,CASE( MOD ((Date_PS_Removed_from_Vendor__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7),0,2,1 ), IF(MOD( Date_PS_Updated_to_Vendor__c - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) - MOD((Date_PS_Removed_from_Vendor__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) <= 0 ,0, IF(MOD((Date_PS_Removed_from_Vendor__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) = 0,1,-2 ) ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tracks number of days with Vendor based on working days
CustomField.label: No of Days With Vendor
